title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 5.16 - Dissemination log
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 5.16 - Dissemination log

State Regulations

Whenever criminal history information is disclosed to
organizations, agencies or persons outside of the department, the officer or
employee making such disclosure shall keep an appropriate record or log to
indicate such disclosure. Such log shall include, at the minimum, the names of
all recipients of information and the date upon which disclosure is made. When
practicable, such log shall also include the name of the inmate or inmates that
are the subject of the disclosure, a brief description of the information
disclosed and whether or not the disclosure is a correction of a previous
disclosure. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
5.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
